briefdescription.para: Creates a new VersionChecksumBytes object from a base-58 encoded string. The base-58 string will be validated by it's checksum. This returns NULL if the string is invalid. The _ERROR_BASE58_DECODE_CHECK_TOO_SHORT error is given if the decoded data is less than 4 bytes. _ERROR_BASE58_DECODE_CHECK_INVALID is given if the checksum does not match.

parameterdescription.para: A base-58 encoded String to make a VersionChecksumBytes object with a termination character.
If true, the bitcoin string for this object will be cached in memory.

simplesect.para: A new VersionChecksumBytes object or NULL on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (VersionChecksumBytes *self, ByteArray *string, int cacheString, void(*onErrorReceived)(Error error, char *,...))
memberdef.name: InitVersionChecksumBytesFromString

briefdescription.para: Initialises a VersionChecksumBytes object from a string.

parameterdescription.para: A String to make a VersionChecksumBytes object with a termination character.
If true, the bitcoin string for this object will be cached in memory.

simplesect.para: true on success, false on failure.

briefdescription.para: Gets a VersionChecksumBytes from another object. Use this to avoid casts.

parameterdescription.para: The object to obtain the VersionChecksumBytes from.

memberdef.argsstring: (VersionChecksumBytes *self, uint8_t *bytes, uint32_t size, int cacheString, void(*onErrorReceived)(Error error, char *,...))
memberdef.name: InitVersionChecksumBytesFromBytes

briefdescription.para: Initialises a new VersionChecksumBytes object from bytes.

parameterdescription.para: The bytes for the VersionChecksumBytes object.
The size of the byte data.
If true, the bitcoin string for this object will be cached in memory.

simplesect.para: true on success, false on failure.

briefdescription.para: Gets the version for a VersionChecksumBytes object.

simplesect.para: The version code. The Macros _PRODUCTION_NETWORK and _TEST_NETWORK should correspond to this.
